title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Cyber Security (Transfer of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Cyber Security (Transfer of 

Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 June 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited cyber security (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2025 (2) order come operation 1 june 2025

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by this Order are 
transferred to the Department of Justice. 

(2) References to the Department of the Environment, Climate and 
Communications contained in any Act or any instrument made under an Act and 
relating to any administration and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, on 
and after the commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the 
Department of Justice.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred order transferred department justice (2) reference department environment climate communication contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department justice

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for the Environment, Climate and
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 

Communications – 

(a) 

by or under the provisions of the Act specified in Part 1 of the 
Schedule, and 

(b) under the Regulations specified in Part 2 of the Schedule, 

are transferred to the Minister for Justice. 

to 

(2) References 

the Minister for 

the Environment, Climate and 
Communications contained in any Act or instrument made under an Act and 
relating to any functions transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the 
commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Minister for 
Justice.

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications is a party and the proceedings have reference to functions 
transferred by this Order to the Minister for Justice, the name of the Minister for 
Justice shall, in so far as the proceedings relate to any function transferred by 
this Order, be substituted in the proceedings for that of the Minister for the 
Environment, Climate and Communications or added in the proceedings, as may 
be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate by reason of such 
substitution. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [234] 3

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications may, in so far as it relates to a function transferred by this Order 
to the Minister for Justice, be carried on or completed from such commencement 
by the Minister for Justice.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister environment climate communication may far relates function transferred order minister justice carried completed commencement minister justice

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the exercise of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far as it was 
operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have effect from 
such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the Minister for Justice. 

to
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made exercise function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister justice

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 7. References
text_raw:
7. References 

the Minister for 

the Environment, Climate and 
Communications contained in the constitution of any company and relating to 
any function transferred by this Order shall, from the commencement of this 
Order, be construed as references to the Minister for Justice.
text_norm: 7 reference minister environment climate communication contained constitution company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister justice

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications in connection with the functions transferred by this Order are 
transferred to the Minister for Justice and, accordingly, without any further 
conveyance, transfer or assignment, on such commencement – 

(a) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Justice, 

(b) 

those rights shall be enjoyed by the Minister for Justice, and 

(c) 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Justice. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Justice by this Article which, on the commencement of this Order, are standing 
in the name of the Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications 
shall, on the request of the Minister for Justice, be transferred into the name of 
the Minister for Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [234]
text_norm: 8 (1) property right liability held enjoyed incurred commencement order minister environment climate communication connection function transferred order transferred minister justice accordingly without conveyance transfer assignment commencement - (a) property real personal vest minister justice (b) right shall enjoyed minister justice (c) liability liability minister justice (2) money stock share security transferred minister justice article commencement order standing name minister environment climate communication shall request minister justice transferred name minister justice 4 234
